topic.title: EMS Procedures Performed Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="67802-9" EMS Procedures Performed Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Procedures Performed" (CONF:10492)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10494)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] procedure (CONF:10495)
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Required to document a procedure not performed, with required "reason not performed" observation
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10496)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03 If EArrest.10 (therapeutic hypothermia) = true, include here as ICD-10 PCS "6A4" For EArrest.03, use either ICD-10 procedure codes listed below or more granular NEMSIS value set Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10497)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10498)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10510)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10511)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10514), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.62 STATIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:10499)/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:10500)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:10502), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.56 STATIC (CONF:10501)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10503)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation (CONF:10515)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10516)/@code="67542-1" Procedure performed prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10517)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10518)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.02
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10504)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10519)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10520)/@code="67543-9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10521)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10522)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10505)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10523)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10524)/@code="67544-7" Procedure successful indicator (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10525)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10526)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.06
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10506)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10527)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10528)/@code="67545-4" Procedure complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10529)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.58 STATIC (CONF:10530)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.07
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10507)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10531)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10532)/@code="67546-2" Procedure patient response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10533)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10534), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10535)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.08
Such procedures SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer (CONF:10508)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10536)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10537), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC (CONF:10538)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10539)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10509)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10540)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10542)/@code="71576-3" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10541)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10544), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.60 STATIC (CONF:10543)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10545)
NEMSIS Trace: if EAirway.02 is populated, this is TRUE
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10546)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:10547)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10548)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:10549)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.61 STATIC (CONF:10550)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.03
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSReasonProcedureNotAttemptedRelationship
This eMSReasonProcedureNotAttemptedRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67504-1" Reason Not Attempted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Reason Procedure not Performed Superset 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.100 STATIC
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="67802-9" EMS Procedures Performed Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Procedures Performed" (CONF:10492)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10494)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] procedure (CONF:10495)
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Required to document a procedure not performed, with required "reason not performed" observation
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10496)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03 If EArrest.10 (therapeutic hypothermia) = true, include here as ICD-10 PCS "6A4" For EArrest.03, use either ICD-10 procedure codes listed below or more granular NEMSIS value set Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; procedure negation = True; ReasonNotAttempted required
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10497)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10498)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10510)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10511)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10514), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.62 STATIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:10499)/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:10500)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:10502), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.56 STATIC (CONF:10501)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10516)/@code="67542-1" Procedure performed prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10517)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10518)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.02

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10519)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10520)/@code="67543-9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10521)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10522)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10523)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10524)/@code="67544-7" Procedure successful indicator (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10525)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10526)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.06
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10506)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10527)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10528)/@code="67545-4" Procedure complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10529)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.58 STATIC (CONF:10530)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.07
Such procedures SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10507)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10531)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10532)/@code="67546-2" Procedure patient response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10533)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10534), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10535)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.08
Such procedures SHALL contain at least one [1..*] performer (CONF:10508)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10536)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10537), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC (CONF:10538)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10539)
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
Such procedures MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10509)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10540)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10542)/@code="71576-3" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10541)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10544), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.60 STATIC (CONF:10543)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10545)
NEMSIS Trace: if EAirway.02 is populated, this is TRUE
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10546)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:10547)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:10548)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:10549)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.61 STATIC (CONF:10550)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.03
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Reason Procedure not Performed Superset 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.100 STATIC

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="922102309"/> <code code="538167173"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <procedure> <templateId root="null"/> <code code="663830862"/> <statusCode code="Aborted"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <approachSiteCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <performer/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship/> </procedure> </entry> </section>
